channel.title: Dementhium 639
channel.description:
I was deleting items out of a shop on the editor, it wouldn't delete the items i tried to delete. now it's giving me this. [code]Loading item definitions... Loaded 20430 item definitions. Loading range weapon info... Loaded 186 range weapon definitions. Loading range ammunition info... Loaded 223 ammunition definitions. Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.nio.BufferUnderflowException at java.nio.Buffer.nextGetIndex(Buffer.java:506) at java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.getInt(DirectByteBuffer.java:677) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor.load(ShopEditor.java:386) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor.<init>(ShopEditor.java:71) at org.dementhium.tools.ShopEditor$9.run(ShopEditor.java:350) at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(InvocationEvent.java:311) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(EventQueue.java:749) at java.awt.EventQueue.access$500(EventQueue.java:97) at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:702) at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:696) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.security.ProtectionDomain$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDo main.java:75) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:719) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThre ad.java:201) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread. java:116) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(EventDispatchThre ad.java:105) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:101)
at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(EventDispatchThread.java:93) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(EventDispatchThread.java:82)
[/code]

item.title: Dementhium 639
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

I was deleting items out of a shop on the editor, it wouldn’t delete the items i tried to delete.
now it’s giving me this.

[code]Loading item definitions…
Loaded 20430 item definitions.
Loading range weapon info…
Loaded 186 range weapon definitions.
Loading range ammunition info…
Loaded 223 ammunition definitions.
